title: we need to talk about 055 comic - pt 1

i'm planning on trying to do some of the anti-memetics department tales as comics, so here's my first small bit i did. thoughts and opinions? good or bad? would you want to see any more of this?please let me know!!
credits to quantum for fabulous writing :)
